mailing-address.narrative: BP 96 Niamakoro Route de l'Aeroport Bamako

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
Education analyses including OOSCI, Education Sector Analyses, etc.
Provision of (formal and non-formal) primary education (including in temporary learning spaces)
Provision of multiple-levels (or alternative pathways of education) teacher training
Provision of parental education for school readiness (including in temporary learning spaces)
Provision of skills development for adolescents (10-19 year-olds) (including in temporary learning spaces)
Provision or procurement of primary education learning materials
Relief co-ordination, protection and support services
System strengthening - community participation and social accountability, e.g. school management committees
System strengthening - inclusive education for children with disabilities

related-activity.ref: 2760/A0/03/018 OUTCOME 4 : EDUCATION DE BASE DE QUALITÉ

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 4.3 : D'ici fin 2014, les enfants d'age scolaire, et plus particulierement ceux affectes par les crises beneficient d'un accès continu a une education de base de qualite sur l'ensemble du territoire

target.value: 2014:D'ici fin 2014, 92 écoles sont réhabilitées et équipées.

actual.value: 2014:Fully Achieved. By the end of 2014, 92 school in the region of Timbuktu have been rehabilitated, in addition, 51 schools in the region of Gao and 30 schools in the region of Timbuktu were provided with school furniture and tables/benches.

title.narrative: Nombre d'lves et d'enseignants ayant reu de matriels scolaire adquats.

baseline.value: Fin 2013, 113,000 lves et plus de 2,600 enseignants ont bnfici de matriels d'apprentissage et pdagogiques.

target.value: 2014:D'ici fin 2014, 500,000 élèves (y inclus les enfants d'âge préscolaire) et 9,000 enseignants ont reçu de matériels d'apprentissage et pédagogiques adéquats.

actual.value: 2014:Partially Achieved. By the end of 2014, 442,786 students (including preschool-aged children) and 9,838 teachers benefitted from adequate teaching, learning and recreational materials.

title.narrative: Nombre d'Espaces d'Apprentissage Temporaires (EAT) mis en place.

baseline.value: Fin 2013, au moins 1,350 enfants ont bnfici de la mise en place de 27 EAT.

target.value: 2014:D'ici fin 2014, au moins 15,000 enfants bénéficient de la mise en place de 300 EAT.

actual.value: 2014:Fully Achieved. By the end of 2014, at least 20,650 pre- and primary (Fondamental 1+2) school-aged children benefitted from the establishment of 413 Temporary Learning Spaces.

title.narrative: Nombre d'enfants ayant bnfici d'une offre alternative d'ducation

baseline.value: Fin 2013, plus de 114,500 ont bnfici d'un programme adapt leur permettant d'achever et valider l'anne scolaire 2012/2013.

target.value: 2014:D'ici fin 2014, 5,000 enfants ont accès à des offres alternatives d'éducation.

actual.value: 2014:Fully Achieved. By the end of 2014, and following the elaboration of modules to reinforce the capacity of teachers, 3,610 children benefitted from an Accelerated Learning Program and reintegration into the public School System in the regions of Mopti, Gao and Timbuktu.

title.narrative: Nombre d'enseignants, dont les capacits pdagogiques ont t renforces.

baseline.value: Fin 2013, plus de 3,000 enseignants ont eu leurs capacits renforces travers des formations sur l'appui psychosocial, la pdagogie des grands groupes, les classes multigrades et la remdiation.

target.value: 2014:D'ici fin 2014, 8,000 enseignants dont les capacités pédagogiques ont été renforcées.

actual.value: 2014:Fully Achieved. By the end of 2014, the capacity of 10,122 teachers was reinforced through provision of at least one training session on the pedagogy of large groups, multigrade teaching, psychosocial support and/or Peacebuilding/Peace-Education.
